Articles.Content:
Sorry, Darkbomber, but it's been double the allowed time now. Let me know if you want to be put back on the list for another try!

Radzaarty, your 48 hour launch window starts now!

-----

Radzaarty never responded - the kraken may have eaten him. Zekes, it's your turn.

Edited September 6, 2012 by khyron42

ROger, coming right up

Edited September 7, 2012 by zekes

Sorry about that, school is eating up my time hugely, I've only really got time for ksp on the weekends now, is it possible to be in a slot continually moved back till it hits a weekend? Otherwise It's going to be hard to keep up with this awesome project. :\
do you think that you could start a new one without mods?

do you think that you could start a new one without mods?

If you want to begin without any mods, perhaps it is a better idea to begin with the Stock community base for 0.16.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/15031-Stock-Community-Base-for-0-16

Guys....

T- 6 to 8 hours to upload, just planning the final details for my launch.....

Since I have school today it must wait untill later, sorry bout that...

But ill get it done!

LANDED.

Got the Runner-1 down, then took K NB3 MM up to Mote Base.

Also Launched the ZADA Space Station.....

Oh, Had only one mishap, but the crew was saved......

No mods added! Happy Flying!

Oh, and sign me up for another flight.....

http://www./?alxy38votxb4yvd

Edited September 8, 2012 by zekes
Can you sign me up for a turn? And can I request that you allow MMI's Kethane as an extra mod?

Nice landings, Zekes.

Kasterfin, I've signed you up and added that as your planned mod. However, keep in mind that means we'll also have to pass around the PluginData/mmi_kethane file if we all want to have the same kethane deposits. It's a problem we run into as we get to adding plugins that have persistent components, and was a big barrier to adding the orbital construction plugin.

I'm planning to add xoxygene on my next turn. In the meantime, the original post has been udpated, KCST has pm'ed me to cancel his flight, so it's Saphira's turn!

Edited September 8, 2012 by khyron42
oke doke, making a copy of KSP so I can install all the mods then I will fly, expect me to be done by tomorrow night.
I have a bit of a problem, I have all the mods apart from the neil armstrong plaque, when I download it, I get an error, so I cant get it working.

I have a bit of a problem, I have all the mods apart from the neil armstrong plaque, when I download it, I get an error, so I cant get it working.

Saphira, you can find it here: http://www.kerbal.net/mod.php?id=8
been a bit delayed due to stuff I've been doing, expect the flight to be finished tonight or tomorrow morning
im having a bit of trouble I think its to do with novapunch, but it keeps making me crash and I dont know what to do, any ideas peeps?
I may have to post pone, feel free to move me down the list, I cant get this problem fixed apart from removing novapunch, and even then I have troubles with KSP and the mods
Saphira, I'll send you a PM.
Saphira, TheCardinal, just update the thread if I need to move on to the next person's turn.

Saphira and i haven't been able (sofar) to get it working. Saphira hasn't even been able to design a proper craft yet due to the problems.

As it seems Saphira's problems might take a little while longer to solve i have made my own flight. I've added the Fuel Transfer mod version 0.2.1..

The flight went without any problems. The fueltruck has landed and all the fuel and RCS tanks of Khyrons Minmus Prime Base have been filled to the brink. The fuel tanks have been topped of again with the fuel remaining in the CargoPlatform Debris which lies some distance away from Minmus Prime Base.

If any vessels on Minmus require a refueling, please notify me and i will do so in my next flight.

[spoiler = Pictures]

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/47942810/screenshot201.png

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/47942810/screenshot204.png

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/47942810/screenshot206.png

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/47942810/screenshot210.png

The new persistence file, turn 19 :https://dl.dropbox.com/u/47942810/persistent.zip

Please sign Saphira up for another flight.

Please sign me up for another flight.

Edited September 15, 2012 by TheCardinal

Whoops. I got a little too busy with work for a couple days there. Thanks for helping work on that issue, and I'll start my flight now.

-----

Outpost Belka has a new addition. Oscar Foxtrot (originally code for Occupied Fueler, now considered more "Overwhelmingly F***ed") somehow managed to land safely even though I was getting about 1/3rd FPS as I landed; I kept hitting escape to pause the game every 2-3 seconds and let the physics catch up. I'd recommend avoiding that base.

I added Zoxygene, and that craft is set to survive the long lunar night. It's got enough fuel to top off the tanks of any other ships there that can't quite manage the return home, but at that frame rate I wasn't going to spend the time doing it!

Sign me up for another flight! It's Zekes' turn.

Edited September 15, 2012 by khyron42
That doesn't surprise me much, Khyron. The third craft from the left has a very large number of parts; An equisite but problem (read: lag) causing design.

I pass this time. My KSP is crashing like crazy, and I dont have enought time to re-download everything.

Mabye next time...

oh just to let you know, I got KSP working again, and I have a mod in mind for my turn, its this mod: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/20604-Plugin-Parts-0-16-Orbital-Rendezvous-and-Docking-Assistant

so yeah, thats what I'll be adding when my turn arises

Edited September 16, 2012 by Saphira

Indeed, maybe next time! I'll treat that as a "sign me back up" request

Kasterfin's turn it is, then!

We're getting down to really few participants at this point - I think it's just that the wave of 0.16 new players have moved on for now, but we'll see how it goes when we get into 0.17!

well, in 17.0 ill be able to becasue right nao my mod KSP is broken.

Count me in for 17.0!
Id love to go for one, but only if that mod list can be shortened.
